content: **knitted socks in drops fabel the piece is worked top down with stocking stitch and rib sizes 35 43 ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no fa-449 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** 35/37 38/40 41/43 foot length approx 22-24-27 cm leg height approx 12-13-14 cm **materials** drops fabel from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 100-100-100 g colour 100 off white **knitting gauge ** 26 stitches in width and 34 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles 2 5 mm needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
